code: import data from"../data/database.json";import data2 from"../data/data.json";export default function getItems(){return data.map(function(item){return{_id:item.id,title:item.title,image:item.image};});}export var getItem=function getItem(id){return data2.find(function(item){return item.title===id;});};export function getProduct(id){return data2.find(function(item){return item.id===id;}).map(function(data){return data.modele;});}
